original_text: Esther had not yet shewed her kindred nor her people; as Mordecai had charged her: for Esther did the commandment of Mordecai, like as when she was brought up with him.
korean_text: 에스더는 모르드개가 명령한 대로 그 종족과 민족을 말하지 아니하니 그가 모르드개의 명령을 양육 받을 때와 같이 따름이더라

sentences.original_text: Esther had not yet shewed her kindred
sentences.korean_translation: 에스더는 아직 자기 친척을 알리지 않았고

sentences.original_text: for Esther did the commandment of Mordecai
like as when she was brought up with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그와 함께 자랄 때와 같이였다
